title: Team Builder Icons
body: so  back when team builder was announced that it was going to be replaced with the new dynamic queues it was stated that the icons you were being put on ice until a place was found for them I was just wondering if they have found that place yet.

replies.body: thanks for the response I just thought there might have been a new way to get them implemented because I noticed this patch I had them all but I had previously read a comment saying that if you hadn't received yours you had to submit a ticket.

Aha, I see!  Thanks for clarifying.  The icons you're referring to are only for players who earned them while the old teambuilder was active, but didn't receive them at that time.  There currently are no teambuilder icons for the current champion select.

If I understand your issue correctly, Teambuilder icons have been sent to eligible accounts already.  You may need to scroll a bit towards the center portion of your summoner icons as they are a little bit older.  If you feel you might be missing icons, [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so we can take a deeper look for you.
I think OP is asking about when are the icons coming back in an earnable form for those who didn't get them in Team builder.
